title: Business Event Subscriptions / İş Olayı Abonelikleri
description: Shows workflow business event subscriptions and their status

queries.sql: SELECT es.event_subscription_id, es.subscription_name, es.event_filter_data, es.status FROM wf_event_subscriptions es WHERE es.rule_function IS NOT NULL ORDER BY es.subscription_name FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Shows workflow business event subscriptions and their status. Disabled subscriptions (status='D') should be investigated.
analysis_prompt: Analyze business event subscriptions. Report: (1) disabled subscriptions, (2) high-volume events, (3) failed executions if tracked, (4) orphaned subscriptions.
